summary: This module provides unit test suites that verify Conan's profile loading and parsing logic. The tests cover correct handling of the compiler C++ standard setting, missing or malformed compiler information, profile composition with includes, tool requirements, build environment configurations, and appropriate error reporting.
business_intent: Ensure the robustness and correctness of Conan's profile management by automatically testing edge cases and typical usage scenarios, thereby preventing configuration errors and improving user confidence in the package manager.
